reasons_to_visit.details: February offers the most peaceful time to experience Český Krumlov's medieval charm without any crowds.
Consistent snow cover creates beautiful winter photography opportunities throughout the historic center.
Perfect weather for exploring museums, art galleries, and the town's rich indoor cultural offerings.
See how locals truly live in this medieval town during the quiet winter months.

reasons_to_avoid.details: February is the coldest month with very limited outdoor activities and some seasonal closures.
Minimal daylight hours significantly limit sightseeing and photography time.
Outdoor activities are completely weather-dependent and often not possible.
